name: Goal 2
description: An evil imprisoning field with various configurations.

fields.name: Goal Shape
fields.description: The shape or arrangement of the imprisoning field.

0.name: Square
0.description: The imprisoning field is in a square shape.

1.name: Diamond
1.description: The imprisoning field is in a diamond shape.

2.name: Horizontal Row
2.description: The imprisoning field is arranged in a horizontal row.

3.name: Vertical Row
3.description: The imprisoning field is arranged in a vertical row.

4.name: Semicircle
4.description: The imprisoning field is in a semicircular shape.

5.name: Maid
5.description: The imprisoning field has a maid shape (specific context unknown).

fields.name: Unknown Variable 1
fields.description: An unknown value related to the goal field.

fields.name: Unknown Variable 2
fields.description: An unknown value related to the goal field.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor if Variable 2 indicates this.
